Toss scallions, garlic, ginger, chiles, oil, and salt in a shallow 2-qt. baking dish to combine.Photo by Chelsie Craig, food styling by Claire SaffitzStep 2Turn garlic cut side down, then roast vegetables, tossing 2 or 3 times, until golden brown, very tender, and crisp around edges, 60–70 minutes.
